description: We need to fix up cells to support objects.  Child cell will pull instance from the DB and pass it to compute-api... but compute-api start and stop now expects objects.
title: start/stop instance broken with cells

comments.content: We need to fix up cells to support objects.  Child cell will pull instance from the DB and pass it to compute-api... but compute-api start and stop now expects objects.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~cbehrens

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/33364

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/33364
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/3689771504df2e1c4b403613793ea88eea4bf820
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 3689771504df2e1c4b403613793ea88eea4bf820
Author: Chris Behrens <email address hidden>
Date:   Mon Jun 17 22:33:40 2013 +0000

    Cells: Pass object for start/stop
    
    The compute_api start/stop methods expect an Instance object, but cells
    is still passing the dict or sqlalchemy form.
    
    Fixes bug 1191040
    
    Change-Id: I21e0f0b5d7e3160e23c7a84f59ae3899538c7327
